hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah (Allah be pleased with them) reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) sacrificed (animals) on behalf of his wives, and in the hadith transmitted by Ibn Abu Bakr (the words are):" A cow on behalf of 'A'isha on the occasion of the Hajj

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِشْتِرَاكِ فِي الْهَدْىِ وَإِجْزَاءِ الْبَقَرَةِ وَالْبَدَنَةِ كُلٍّ مِنْهُمَا عَنْ سَبْعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to share in the sacrifice, and a camel or a cow is sufficient for seven people
